00115             static inline float invSqrt ( float x ) {
00116                 float xhalf = 0.5f*x;
00117                 int i = *(int*)&x; // get bits for floating value
00118                 i = 0x5f3759df - (i>>1); // gives initial guess y0
00119                 x = *(float*)&i; // convert bits back to float
00120                 x = x*(1.5f-xhalf*x*x); // Newton step, repeating increases accuracy
00121                 
00122                 return x;
00123             }
00124             
00125

00136                                       const Vector2D & planeN );
